WorkItem.Description: A small C# VS 2010 port detector dll that is COM wrapped.  Exposes a CheckPort method with IPAddress and PortNumber parameters.  Returns PortInUse boolean property whether the port is currently in use or not.
WorkItem.Summary: Is Port In Use Detector - COM wrapped

Comments.Message:
